title: Interesting place
name: Interesting place
description:
A Map by Mort

一些有趣的地方和我喜歡的地方

I like to take photo and play everywhere, so you can see a lot of photographs in this map.

properties.name: An Ping Castle 安平古蹟區
properties.description: Posted by Kclama More of my photos at Taiwan.

properties.name: Anping Fort 安平古堡
properties.description: Posted by Mort 安平古堡是台灣歷史最悠久的城堡，最初的安平古堡是荷蘭人建造的熱蘭遮城，又稱奧倫治城，城分內城和外城，內城3層；有長官公署、瞭望台、教堂、士兵營房，並高懸荷蘭國旗，是行政的核心所在。1873年英國軍艦船砲命中城內軍火庫引發爆炸，城牆炸毀，之後變成廢墟。 磚石一度成為居民修築房舍、清廷建造億載金城的建材。日據時代，原有的城垣被剷平， 改建成今日所見的日式海關宿舍與紅磚平台，荷式城堡的樣子已經看不出來了。 This place is the fortress that the Hollander sets up in 1624. There are a lot of ancient old historic relics in neighborhood and have a lot of delicious foods.

properties.name: Birds in NTU's farm 台大農場裡的鳥
properties.description: Posted by Mort除了田裡樹上還有一些白頭翁 Farmland had two pairs of birds here.

properties.name: Birdwing butterfly 珠光鳳蝶
properties.description: Posted by MortBirdwing butterfly學 名： Troides magellanus (C. & R. Felder) 英 名： Birdwing butterfly 分 類： LEPIDOPTERA 鱗翅目 Papilionidae 鳳蝶科 形態描述： 大型鳳蝶，展翅1∼25公分，無尾狀突起；雄蝶 翅為黑色，前翅各翅脈外緣呈褐色，後翅金黃 色，各翅外緣線有鋸齒狀黑斑，反面與正面相 同；雌碟色較淡，後翅基部至中橫線間與亞外 緣各室有黃色斑。本種與黃裳鳳蝶十分相似， 但腹部背面呈黃褐色，不是黑色，且後赤金黃色 It is the biggest butterfly in Taiwan.

properties.name: Chiayi Jinja 嘉義神社
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Chiayi Shrine嘉義神社 創建於大正 4年（1915）, 光復後改為忠烈祠,於1994年因火災全毀,原址於1998年改建為「射日塔」，原有神社配置格局保存相當完整。 照片裡面的是社務所兩間房子中間有走道連接，裡面的感覺很舒服... Jinja of the Japanese construction in Taiwan.

properties.name: Chihkan Tower 赤崁樓
properties.description: Posted by Mort17世紀荷蘭人來台為防止暴動，便修築普羅民西亞[Provintia]城城堡，Provintia 荷文為永恆之意。建築高為10公尺半以糖水、糯汁攪拌貝殼灰，糊紅磚砌成，為四方形的城堡，在東北與西南角各有兩座凸出的菱堡。 咸豐年間在城堡舊址上開始出現中國式的樓閣建築。官府再把殘城高度鑿切一半，回填台基，建起「海神廟」，現在的赤崁樓呈現的則是，荷式城堡遺跡與清式樓閣建築共存。 It is the city that the Hollander sets up originally here.Start afterwards on the original city constructing a Chinese type building.

properties.name: Chinese herb store 乾元蔘藥行
properties.description: Posted by Mort  臺北市 迪化街[永樂町] 迪化街裡的裝飾藝術風格建築 過年的時候非常熱鬧。 Art Deco style building.

properties.name: Cigu Black-faced Spoonbill protectorate 七股黑面琵鷺保護區
properties.description: Posted by Mort Cigu Black-faced Spoonbill protectorate 七股黑面琵鷺保護區中文名稱：黑面琵鷺 學名：Platalea minor 英名：Black-faced Spoonbill 目前黑面琵鷺約有400隻，主要分佈於中國大陸、台灣、香港、越南、日本、及朝鮮半島。近年在宜蘭、台東、屏東、鰲股等溪口或魚塭都曾發現牠們，曾文溪口沼澤區則擁有數量最多近兩百隻的渡冬族群，被劃為黑面琵鷺的保護區。每年十月到隔年的四月這段期間，全世界一半以上的黑面琵鷺都會到這邊來 October goes to following year every year in April this period, whole world more than half Black-faced Spoonbill all will go to this place.

properties.name: DIAMOND HALL 鑽石樓
properties.description: Posted by Mort台南市西門路2段206號

properties.name: Display fireworks at the beach 黃金海岸放煙火
properties.description: Posted by Mort  晚上在黃金海岸放煙火 I and my friend went to display fireworks and play a water here in evening.

properties.name: Drinking water museum 自來水博物館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Drinking water museum 自來水博物館1908建，國內首座自來水博物館。 Originally is pulls out the original water, the water distribution place. Now becomes the drinking water museum.

properties.name: Dunhua North Rd.
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Dunhua North Rd.維多利亜花園 Blossoms garden fountain and awning

properties.name: Fort San Domingo 淡水紅毛城
properties.description: Posted by Mort西班牙人在淡水河口邊山丘上興建的聖多明哥城，主堡牆壁非常厚，約近二公尺，算是外國人在台灣留下的建築中比較完整的堡壘建築吧！ The Fort that the Spanish constructs in Taiwan.The Hollander, British of passing by builds and becomes continuously. [Here have a lot of dragonflies to fly in the sky. ]

properties.name: Fulong Beach 福隆沙灘
properties.description: Posted by Mort   Fulong Beach 福隆沙灘和海洋音樂祭 Here will hold the sea music festival every year in the summer Fulong is located at the mouth of the Shuanghsi River, across which spans a bridge connecting the inland river and beachfront areas. The river is calm and suitable for sailing, canoeing, banana boating, cross-country driving, jeep riding, and parasailing, while at the ocean, visitors can enjoy various kinds of water activities.

properties.name: Giant red birdcage
properties.description: Posted by Mort Dunhua South Rd. 敦化南路上的裝置藝術 Is located Dunhua South Rd.public art

properties.name: Gueishan Island 龜山島
properties.description: Posted by Mort台灣最年輕的火山，目前還是活火山 The Gueishan Island is a volcano island, is also an active volcano.

properties.name: Hai-an Rd. 海安路
properties.description: Posted by MortThere is ancient street in Tainan here.

properties.name: Heavenly Lantern Festival 平溪放天燈
properties.description: Posted by Mort Pingsi Heavenly Lantern Festival is one of the three most popular and well-known celebration event during the Lantern Festival. Through this festival, presenting the Heavenly Lantern tradition and the natural beauty of Pingsi to the public and prayers to the heavenly God and wishing for prosperity and peace for the nation and its citizens.

properties.name: Hot springs museum 北投溫泉博物館
properties.description: Posted by Mort   溫泉博物館１９１３年台北州廳興建的北投溫泉浴場。溫泉浴池環繞著拱形石柱與彩繪玻璃窗，占地七百坪，一樓磚造二樓木造，為當時最富盛名、規模最大的公共浴場。 This building is the hot springs public bath field that built in 1913. Now here becomes hot springs museum.

properties.name: Huashan Culture Park 華山[台北酒廠]
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Huashan Culture Park華山園區前身為「台北酒廠」，創設於日治時期大正5年（西元1916年），原為民營芳釀株式會社酒造廠，專製清酒、蝴蝶蘭、人參酒；大正11年（西元1922年），由日治政府予以收買，以製造米酒及各種再製酒為主；光復後政府接收改名為台灣省專賣局台北酒工廠。早年生產價格低廉、以樹薯為原料的「太白酒」成為一般民眾日常消費的最愛，大約從五十年代中期，米酒的產量逐漸增加，研發各種水果酒，開始了台北酒廠的黃金時代，甚至獲得「水果酒工廠」的稱號。 現有烏梅酒廠、高塔區（品控、化驗、試驗室）、米酒作業場、四連棟（紅酒貯藏庫）、行政大樓、果酒大樓、再製酒作業場、維修工廠、蒸餾室、鍋爐室（汽罐室）、煙囪 The “Taipei Winery” was first established in 1916 (5 th Year of the Taisho Period) during the Japanese colonial period as the privately owned Houjou winery which made rice wine, the “Butterfly Orchid” sake, and ginseng liqueur. In 1922 (11 th Year of the Taisho Period) the Japanese Government purchased the winery as part of its alcohol monopoly policy, and began expanding the winery for producing rice wines and other double-distilled liqueurs. In 1945 the Taipei Winery transferred to the control of the Taiwan Tobacco & Wine Monopoly Bureau . The winery began developing various kinds of fruit liqueurs, and even became known as the “Fruit Wine Factory”. Memories from the past including how soot from the chimneys drifted down on workers after their morning exercise and the showing of movies in the Fruit Wine Hall. These and other workers\' tales have all left their impression on the surroundings, a testament to a time when “The Winery was Home”. In 1987, due to the pressures of urban development, the winery was relocated to its current location at the Linkou Industrial Park in Taipei County. The old site was then simply abandoned.

properties.name: Jianguo Brewery 建國啤酒廠
properties.description: Posted by MortJianguo BreweryHere is the first beer factory in Taiwan. Have already been been included in a historic site.

properties.name: Jiantan  underground passage 劍潭地下道
properties.description: Posted by MortJiantan Subway劍潭地下道 Jiantan underground passage This underground passage is designs by the artist. It is beautiful in the night and specially.

properties.name: Jingtong Station 菁桐車站
properties.description: Posted by Mort平溪線裡保存的很好的車站 孤戀花拍攝的場景之一

properties.name: Lintian Mountain 林田山林業文化園區
properties.description: Posted by Mort 林田山原本是一座個有著溫泉旅館的小小山村，在1926年日本人興建林田山鐵路，成為台灣重要伐木林場後，被日本人稱為摩里沙卡，成為一座重要伐木林場，到了國府接收後，繼續伐木事業，到了1960年代，山上更聚集二千多人，遠比山下小鎮更為熱鬧，但是和其它伐木山城一樣，林田山伐木結束後，開始一段漫長的荒村歲月，居民大量搬遷，房舍漸漸坍毀，沒有多少人記得林田山。 最近幾年，林田山十分風光，成為花東地區的旅遊重鎮，居民也思考從生態旅遊角度，開創林田山的另一個高峰，讓林田山在社區發展上，成為一種標竿，吸引許多遊客與社區團隊前往拜訪。 但是，居民開創出林田山的繁華之後，實際並未讓當地居民走向永續，卻讓他們面臨被迫辦遷的命運，最近一紙整理國有財產的公文，切割開居民與土地的關係，讓居民恐慌，他們心中依戀的故鄉，其實是國有財產的宿舍，無論居住多久，為這塊土地努力多少，他們永遠寄人籬下，他們是一群沒有未來的人。 林田山在沒落中走向興盛，居民努力的心血，國家全數收割，將生活社區改為遊樂園區，甚至守了數十年的老房子，一夕拆除重建，就以促進觀光發展的名義，讓一個古老社區成為新穎遊樂地。 ●本文轉載自公共電視台「我們的島」節目

properties.name: Love River 愛河-高雄燈會 Lantern Festival
properties.description: Posted by Mort  晚上的愛河很漂亮is a beautiful river. 去的時候剛好是高雄燈會最後一天 You can see here beautiful landscape in daytime and at the night. In the special festival meeting a display of fireworks and very noisy.

properties.name: MOCA Taipei 台北當代藝術館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  MOCA Taipei當代藝術館原本是日本人蓋的建成小學，後來曾經作為台北市政府使用，現在是當代藝術館，是一棟兩層樓的建築有斜屋頂和小鐘樓，空間不是非常大但是展覽的內容都很有趣，在台北比較喜歡的一間博物館 This is a contemporary art museum. The museum\'s building is a municipal historic site. Today its hybrid blend of Euro-influenced architectural appearance and structure is imbued with aspects from the Japanese colonial period making the building a unique locus. One of my most favorite museums.

properties.name: Matsu islands tern protectorate 馬祖列島燕鷗保護區
properties.description: Posted by MortMatsu islands tern protectorate 馬祖列島燕鷗保護區馬祖列島燕鷗保護區，是全世界第4次觀察紀錄，而且是世界唯一繁殖紀錄，估計數量至少有8隻、4個巢位，而且每巢各有一隻幼鳥順利成長，黑嘴端鳳頭燕鷗被世界鳥類紅皮書中列為「瀕臨滅絕」等級與黑面琵鷺同一等級、但數量更少，概估全球數量少於100隻。 黑嘴端鳳頭燕鷗 英名︰Chinese Crested Tern 法名︰Sterne d\'Orien 德名︰Bernsteinseeschwalbe 學名︰Thalasseus bernsteini 形態特徵 嘴黃色，嘴前端帶有黑色；羽色為淡淡的灰色，不同於鳳頭燕鷗的灰黑色，黑嘴端鳳頭燕鷗更雪白些。停棲時，翼尖約與尾等長。額頭頂有一大片白色，似禿頭，頭兩端有些許黑色。 生態習性 是鷗科鳥類中最稀少的一種，自1863年被命名以來，比較確定的觀察紀錄只有五筆，十年前已絕跡。直到公元兩千年在馬祖列島燕鷗保護區，發現其繁殖紀錄，這是世界第一次發現其有繁殖紀錄的地方。目前世界僅存不到一百隻，由於數量稀少，瀕臨絕種，且經常混雜在鳳頭燕鷗鳥群中，不易觀察，因此又名「神話之鳥」。 棲地分布 馬祖列島、八掌溪口曾發現其蹤跡。 Chinese Crested Tern protectorate

properties.name: Mineral industry company guest house 菁桐太子賓館
properties.description: Posted by Mort台陽礦業株式會社俱樂部，有212坪[很大...]，保存蠻完整的日式建築，很值得進去看。 孤戀花拍攝的場景之一，裡面放了一張孤戀花的海報，不過裡面不能拍照。 附近有很多的蜻蜓跟蝴蝶[到處飛...] 那兩張是豆娘[短腹幽蟌Euphaua formosa Hagan] This is a very beautiful Japanese house, can see a lot of dragonflies here.

properties.name: Old Hospital of Army 日軍台南衛戍病院
properties.description: Posted by Mort 這裡是日治時期日軍在台灣設立的軍醫院，戰後成立八O四醫院，近年醫院遷離，成功大學爭取成為力行校區，整修後將有系所遷入。 曾經是醫院又有一段時間沒使用，裡面還是有點恐怖，倒是很適合拍照的地方。 It was a military hospital built by the Japanese Army during the Japanese Colonization.

properties.name: ROSARY CATHDRAL 高雄玫瑰聖母堂
properties.description: Posted by Mort台灣第一座天主教堂 The first cathedral in Taiwan.

properties.name: SPOT-Taipei Film House 光點台北
properties.description: Posted by Mort   SPOT-Taipei Film House前美國大使館，中美斷交荒廢多年後整修成為光點電影院並有誠品和咖啡館在裡面，在這裡可以看到一些比較特別的電影 SPOT-Taipei Film House, Operate by Taiwan Film and Culture Society, is officially opened on November 10th, 2002. " SPOT-Taipei Film House" is formerly the residency of the U.S. Anmbassador, now a historical landmark after the restoration sponsored by the TSMC Education & Culture Foundation. SPOT is now managed by the internationally acclaimed director Hou Hsiao-hsien and his staff, aimed to establish a film oriented complex, to serve as an interactive window of cross-culture exchange for the creative industry. Spot not only provides the finest movie with more culture diversity, but also creates a channel for filmmakers and the movie lover to exchange ideas, and to generate various possible thinking through the conference and the workshop. A multi-functional building was composed: Spot Cinema- screening the fine-selected movies from all over the world, Eslite Bookstore, C25 Coffee Shop, the exhibition gallery, the multi-media conference room, and the SixthAvenue- the finest winery lounge. Address: 18, Sec. 2, Zhongshan N. Road, Taipei

properties.name: Sansia Old Street 三峽老街
properties.description: Posted by Mort是三峽早期的市集中心，街道兩旁商店林立，保留了完整日據時代以來的商業街屋 The street both sides contain a lot of stores, can see ancient street here.

properties.name: Shihfen St. 十分老街
properties.description: Posted by Mort火車就走在老街中間，路邊好多貓咪跟蜻蜓 [戀戀風塵海報中拍攝的地方]

properties.name: Sinying Park 新營公園
properties.description: Posted by Mort  很漂亮的公園 建築設計成可以產生太陽能，建築光電一體設計，不只好看同時也能發電 This is a building that can produce solar energy. It is very beautiful and can produce energy.

properties.description: Posted by Kclama   My other photos in Taiwan.

properties.description: Posted by Mort  植物園的熱帶雨林溫室 There is a beautiful glasshouse here.

properties.name: Taipei Botanical Garden   台北植物園
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Taipei Botanical Garden 植物園在歷史博物館旁，佔地約８公頃，園內有１５００多種植物。夏天水池開滿了荷花,有很多小動物住在裡面。 You can see a lot of plants, birdses, insects and squirrel here. First here is Be study plant of place, the plant grows very luxuriantly now, can see a lot of lotuses on summer, the birds will build nest here, becoming a lot of biologic houses

properties.name: Taipei mosque 台北清真寺
properties.description: Posted by MortTaibei mosque台北清真寺 Traditional Islam construction Taipei minority has one of exotic atmosphere constructions

properties.name: TaipeiArena 台北小巨蛋
properties.description: Posted by MortTaipeiArena

properties.name: Tait & Co.  德記洋行
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Tait & Co hong 位於台南市安平的三級古蹟原英商德記洋行，在一百多年後可望由台南市府委託德記洋行股份有限公司再次經營。 Tait & Co. was founded in 1867 (Tongtze 6th Year, Ching Dynasty) in Haitoushe, Anping, trading opium, camphor and sugar. After Taiwan was ceded to Japan in 1895 (Guangsui 21st Year, Ching Dynasty), the sale of opium and camphor became a government franchise, and the number of foreign companies decreased. Moreover, as Anping Port was silted up and affected the normal operations of local waterways, many foreign companies were closed, except Tait & Company. The office of Tait & Co. is 200 feet long and 120 feet wide. Together with the Bain & Co., Bovd & Co., Julius Mannich & Co., and Wright & Co., they were known as the top five foreign companies in Anping. As they were built in Western style, they looked different from local buildings in traditional Fujian style. Moreover, they are the witnesses of foreign trade in Taiwan. No.194, Anbei Rd., Anping District, Tainan City 708, Taiwan (R.O.C.)

properties.name: TaiwanLantern Festival 2006台灣燈會
properties.description: Posted by Mort 2006/02/12－2006/02/26 Had a lot of lanterns and put a lot of fireworks at that time.

properties.name: Tamsui Sunset 淡水夕陽
properties.description: Posted by Mort天氣好的時候可以看見美麗的夕陽 The sunset here is very well-known.

properties.name: Tamsui customs official mansion 淡水小白宮
properties.description: Posted by MortTamsui customs official mansion建於西元1866年 清代海關官邸，西班牙白堊迴廊式建築 Spanish chalk winding corridor type construction. Constructed to in 1866 The construction outward appearance arches the porch pillar.

properties.name: The British Consulate 打狗英國領事館
properties.description: Posted by Mort The British ConsulateIn 1864 the British moved consulate from Tamsui to Kaohsiung. Japanese viceroy the wall of consulate building with white cement to avoid bomb attack from US air force during the 2nd world war. Kaohsiung city government commissioned Professor Li Chien - Lang to repair the consulate building as a museum to store historic documents and cultural products. More photos ↙ http://www.wretch.cc/album/album.php?id=wrsfxv37&book=9

properties.name: The Lin family garden 板橋林家花園
properties.description: Posted by Mort   板橋林本源園邸 目前台灣僅存最完整的園林建築，和台南吳園、新竹北郭園、霧峰萊園並稱「台灣四大名園」。 Taiwanese keep the most complete garden building currently. Be filled with a beautiful Chinese building in garden.

properties.name: The bird of tidying up feather 整理羽毛的鳥
properties.description: Posted by Mort 在動物園裡拍到正在整理自己羽毛的鳥，牠的動作看起來很有趣。 This is the bird in Taipei zoo. And it is tidying up feather.

properties.name: The coal mine processing field 菁桐洗礦場
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: Treasurehill 寶藏巖
properties.description: Posted by Mort新店溪邊的寶藏巖山坡上的老違建聚落 ，2006年，《紐約時報》將寶藏巖納入台北最具特色的景點之一，和101並列台北最直得觀賞的景點之一

properties.name: Wang-Gong Footbridge 王功生態景觀橋
properties.description: Posted by Mort Wanggong Ecology landscape bridge很漂亮造型也很特別的橋 This bridge got many prizes. This is a very beautiful bridge, the shape of the bridge is very modern, will have the light lighting in the evening, there is fishing bay in neighborhood can see sunset.

properties.name: White tower 消防瞭望塔
properties.description: Posted by Mort I like tower.

properties.name: Yehliu Special Scenic Area 野柳地質公園
properties.description: Posted by Mort Yehliu Special Scenic Area野柳為大屯山餘脈伸出海中的岬角，有海蝕洞溝、燭狀石、蕈狀岩、豆腐石、蜂窩石、壺穴、溶蝕盤等各種地質景觀。 野柳常見的鳥類有： 留鳥：麻雀、綠繡眼、白頭翁、紅嘴黑鵯、小彎嘴畫眉、山紅頭、褐頭及灰頭鷦鶯、斑紋鷦鶯、黑鳶(老鷹)、岩鷺、 小白鷺..... 冬候鳥：藍磯鶇、虎鶇、白腹鶇、大白鷺、灰鶺鴒、磯鷸、短翅樹鶯、黃尾鴝、黑臉巫、隼..... There are a lot of special geology views here

properties.name: Yingge Ceramics Museum 鶯歌陶瓷博物館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Yingge Ceramics MuseumYou can see here many special potteries and china. And can learn manufacture pottery.

properties.name: Yung Ming Mountain 楊明山
properties.description: Posted by Kclama The Heat on Vimeo More of my photos at Taiwan.

properties.name: five-dime restaurant 伍角船板.
properties.description: Posted by Mort 伍角船板台北店... The building of the restaurant very special.

properties.name: miramar 美麗華
properties.description: Posted by Mort miramar每次都看著摩天輪下班，也認識了很多好玩的人，過的一段很有趣的時光。 A department store that has the ferris wheel. Here became one of the obvious landmarks of the city.

properties.name: 保安車站 Baoan station
properties.description: Posted by Mort可愛的小車站，車站建築使用阿里山檜木和日本黑瓦建成，主結構以榫接方式建造而成完全不使用鐵釘。台鐵於一九九三年宣布永久保存保安車站原貌，目前購票口前的隔欄、候車室的木質長椅都是舊物。 This is an old station. The station still keeps old appearance today.

properties.name: 台南測候所 Meteorology museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  台南測候所是三個同心圓構成的建物，外圍是十八邊形，設有十八扇窗戶，裡面有陳列早年的地震儀、無線發報器和一些氣象的舊文件。 白色的塔裡有旋轉樓梯上去，很可愛的房子。 Shape very special building. The past is the place that uses to prognosticate the meteorology earthquake here.

properties.name: 國家廣播文物館 National Radio Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  日據時代這裡是「民雄放送所」，民國三十四年改名為「台灣廣播電台民雄播送機室」。於民國八十八年元月開館對外開放參觀。Here was a broadcasting station now becomes broadcasts museum. The museum to have very many ancient machines.

properties.name: 安平樹屋 Anping Tree House
properties.description: Posted by Mort 安平樹屋 This house was a warehouse before.Full with the tree becomes an interesting place now

properties.name: 希臘風情
properties.description: Posted by Mort 希臘風情永康街裡的一間地中海餐廳，裡面的餐點口味十分地中海 Place Greece delicacies Aegean Sea character and style

properties.name: 彰化扇形車庫 The train services factory
properties.description: Posted by MortChanghua Fan shape fire garage 彰化扇形車庫建於民國十一年提供蒸汽機車維修用 全台六座扇形車庫僅存的車庫 The train services factory.

properties.name: 新竹影像博物館 Image museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  開放時間：週三至週日 09:30-12:00 13:30-17:00 18:30-21:00 日據時代稱「新竹市營有樂館」，於 1933 年開幕啟用，是全台灣第一座擁有冷氣設備的戲院，光復後更改名為「國民大戲院」

properties.name: 林柳新紀念偶戲博物館 Lin Liu-Hsin Puppet Theatre Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  博物館本身是在一棟漂亮的舊房子裡，有很多puppet。 是一個有趣的博物館，可以看見美好的東方文化。 地址：台北市西寧北路79號 The museum is in a beautiful old house, there are a lot of puppets. It is an interesting museum, can see fine oriental culture here. http://www.taipeipuppet.com/index-menu.html

properties.name: 楠梓煉油廠宿舍 Refinery dormitory
properties.description: Posted by Mort 宿舍的範圍很大片，不只一區(標示地點只是其中一個入口) 白色巨塔 五月天知足MV有到這裡拍。 Here is a very attractive dormitory area. Has many trees and the flower.

properties.name: 榕園 The big tree of NCKU
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 橋頭糖廠 Sugar industry museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  橋頭糖廠(台灣糖業博物館)殖民樣式的建築、五分車還有賣冰棒跟冰淇淋。 這裡有很多樹和花所以可以看到蝴蝶自由的在飛。 This place is the Taiwan first new style mechanical system sugar factory. Now has the production popsicle and the ice cream.

properties.name: 福興穀倉 Fusing Granary
properties.description: Posted by Mort2005/10/25「福興穀倉修復案」獲得肯定，並獲選為2005年的台灣建築獎首獎。 [附近的鹿港國中以前是鹿港神社]

properties.name: 衛武營十字樓
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 阿蓮鄭宅Chin Bin Design CO.,LTD.
properties.description: Posted by Mort  阿蓮鄭宅-青本設計 Chin Bin Design CO.,LTD. 第一屆 台灣住宅建築獎私人住宅類「高雄阿蓮鄉鄭宅」第二名 This house is the first batch Taiwanese residence to construct private residence the second prize.
